name: Angry Boss
description:
is recommended downloading the game

A game I made for VimJam2

In this game you are a boss that is in the edge of a bankrupt, so you need to fire all your employees! But careful, you have a limited time, and that time is so small you basically need to speedrun everything! 

this game is hard, but all the levels are totally possible

if you are a nooba and don't know how to beat here's some tips:

  1.  for avoiding some taxes, maybe you will need to rotate the character...
  2. maybe there are ways quicker than the others...

(all the credits are in-game)
